mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEWNUM, MEMNUM, TRIPNUM, REVIEWCOMENT, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memnum}, #{tripnum}, #{reviewcoment}, 'Y', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.REVIEWNUM REVIEWNUM ,A.MEMNUM MEMNUM ,A.TRIPNUM TRIPNUM ,A.REVIEWCOMENT REVIEWCOMENT ,A.INSERTDATE INSERTDATE FROM REVIEW A WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MEMNUM = #{memnum} ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET DELETEYN = 'N', INSERTDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND REVIEWNUM = #{reviewnum}
